titleStmt.title: An Impartial account of the nature and tendency of the late addresses in a letter to a gentleman in the country.
titleStmt.author: Shaftesbury, Anthony Ashley Cooper, Earl of, 1621-1683.

notesStmt.note: Possibly by the Earl of Shaftesbury. Cf. Halkett & Laing (2nd ed.).
Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
